Action.author: wlahti
Action.body: As the easiest start imaginable, I created a PR to remove the second log ("Failed to deleted...") that duplicates the first only with zero context about why it failed: https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric-ca/pull/181

Action.author: wlahti
Action.body: I've updated the above PR to also move the StartNonceSweeper() call out of NewNonceManager() and instead call it externally while starting the server.

Action.author: robmurgai
Action.body: ~wlahti Â does this impact V2.X as well, or just v1.4.X?

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~robmurgai Fabric-CA PRs go to master first for a potential v2.0 release in the future, and then get backported to v1.4.x.
